<title level="1" pfs="">[Drunkard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3455)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Every tavern has one—that person intent on forgetting their sorrows along with everything else. Though many are harmless, a few have a hair trigger.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Drunkard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3455)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 41

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Alcohol Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +3, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
drunkard's outfit (functions as [padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=40)), [pewter mug](/Equipment.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pewter mug +8 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Drunken Flailing** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The drunkard is raging; **Effect** The drunkard attempts two fist Strikes, each against a different creature.

**Drunken Rage** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Requirements** The drunkard is drunk, and isn't [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73) or raging; **Effect** The drunkard flies into a drunken rage. They gain 6 temporary Hit Points that last until the drunken rage ends. While raging, they deal 4 additional damage with melee attacks and take a –1 penalty to AC. The drunkard can't use [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561) actions except [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301). The rage lasts for 1 minute, until the drunkard falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95), or until the drunkard sobers up. The drunkard can't voluntarily stop raging. Once the rage ends, the drunkard can't gain temporary HP from this action for 1 minute.

</column>
